## Plots

```{r plotslinks, results='asis'}
for (data_file in params$data_files)
{
  cat(paste0("[", basename(data_file), "](", file.path("html", 
                                                  paste0(tools::file_path_sans_ext(basename(data_file)), 
                                                         ".html")), ")\n\n"))
}
```
